phrases: You find what you were looking for?
Maybe I should just order it in...
You could ask a clerk to help.
Nah, I will just keep looking for it!
Mmkay, I am going to grab this.
Oh, I will come with you.
I am going to buy something, too.
They have got some game magazines over there!
So I am helping you now?
I see what you are doing, Yoshikawa.
What could you possibly be talking about?
You are Here, I am Here
That DVD I wanted is out today.
Come with me to pick it up later.
I will let you borrow it later!
The actor playing the shopkeeper is so hot!
-Ever since Hori and Miyamura started dating, -And not just that...
-Yoshikawa's been giving me lots of attention.
-Are you even listening to me right now?
-Are you even listening to me right now?
No, I was the one who ran into you.
We got to watch where we are going.
I really hope it does not leave a stain.
I was not sure if you would be able to wear that home, Kono-san.
And I figured Yoshikawa's is probably too small...
And I figured Yoshikawa's is probably too small...
Mine's going to be big, but at least it is something.
Mine's going to be big, but at least it is something.
You want me to wear this?
Oh, crap, I should have just brought you yours!
Oh, she had to head home to take care of some stuff.
She did open the window, though.
She is keeping on top of her window duty, huh.
What is it that you like about her?
I cannot believe you are asking me that, too.
I-Is it that shocking for me to ask?!
I guess the fact that she is not very strong, so she needs me around.
So you want someone weak to stand next to you to make you look strong?
I do not control her, just, like, I want to protect her!
She makes me want to protect her.
But that is kind of what I like about her.
I am not even that strong in the first place.
But Remi makes me want to be stronger, if just for her sake.
Because she is behind me, pushing me forward,
I have the strength to give her the push she needs, too.
In the end, she is protecting me.
Just like how she protects you, right, Sakura?
Courage to try just a little bit harder.
Thank you for lending me this.
Sorry it took me so long to give it back.
I wanted to wash it first.
Aww, you did not have to go through all that trouble!
Thank you again for the help.
Thank you again for the help.
I-I made too many cookies, so, uh...
Oh, but if you make these again, bring more!
Why did you do that, Yuki?
You have been looking for that forever.
She looked like she wanted it, and I can always find it another day.
Ishikawa, someone is lookin' for ya!
I have not seen you and Toru together for a bit.
He is probably off somewhere eating cookies.
What is that supposed to mean?
I have only known her for three years, but I can read her pretty well.
Ooh, we have got study hall next!
The less she wants you to know she is upset, the bigger she smiles.
Even when she desperately wants something, she will never say so out loud.
And she will never say I love this or I want this with all her heart.
So the things she loves or wants tend to escape her.
I wanted to thank you for lending me that handkerchief.
I am glad you like them!
Might as well just take them if they are going to be this good.
I have never made one before.
It does not have to be fancy.
I just want it to taste good.
Guess that is kind of hard, though.
You know, Yoshikawa-san, I was not born knowing how to bake a cake.
Nobody's good at anything when they first start.
If you mess up, just give it another shot.
These took you a whole week?
We are really starting from square one, here, huh?!
Why do not you want Toru in on this?
B-Because he would totally make fun of me!
He would not, especially if he knew you are making them for him.
I am not making them for him!
Cannot wait for the next batch!
Miyamura went up to Hokkaido, right?
Yeah, he is visiting family up there for five days.
So he will not be here all week.
Wait, then I will have to read different lines in class!
Miyamura was going to read the fifth line, so...
It is a lot cooler up here.
Uncle, can I borrow your phone charger?
Sure, does mine work with yours?
Can we go to the convenience store?
We are a little busy, honey.
I cannot drive you anywhere right now.
Hold tight for a bit, okay?
You are going to drink two?
Got To stay hydrated in this heat.
You keep downing those sugary drinks and you will get fat, Yoshikawa.
It is a lot cooler up here
Kyoko, that is not my bowl.
Oh, that is my bro's bowl!
Are you trying to push my buttons or something?
Guess even you slip up now and then.
Hey, I want to watch Hurricane Star!
Why are you binging the news?
Our next story tonight: carry-on restrictions at airports continue to...
Ishikawa-kun says the test got postponed.
I never knew how long five days could feel.
Hurry up and get back here, dummy.
Miyamura does not like horror movies.
But he will still watch them with me, so maybe he does like'them after all.
Because you are making him watch them.
you are going to push him away if you keep watching all that scary stuff.
A cute girl gleefully watching slasher flicks is pretty creepy...
C'mon now, I am not that cute.
That was not the point there, Hori.
I borrowed this for us, Hori-san.
It has lots of dogs in it!
Can we watch Right Behind You: The Third Nightmare instead?
You are going to push him away if you keep watching all that scary stuff.
Miyamura, so, uh, this movie's, uh...
Compared to the PG-13 gorefests we always watch,
You should pretend to be scared!
Maybe this just will not work...
Maybe you could hold his hand?
I just want to have fun watching a movie with him...
I am sorry I am such a scaredy-cat.
It is not your fault, Miyamura.
Give me a second, I need a moment alone.
He is totally done with me...
I am not cute at all.
Wait, were you doing all that for me?
I was too freaked-out and scared to notice.
Why do you keep apologizing to me?!
Do not look at me, dummy!
You are the big dummy here, Hori-san.
I did not fall in love with a normal girl.
Let us go watch the rest of the movie.
His long eyelashes, his scaredy-cat jumps,
his sarcastic quips, how thin he feels in my arms.
I am listening to your heart.
Your hands and ears are really cold, Miyamura.
You cannot go home in this downpour.
There was a heat within me,
and I wanted Miyamura to feel it, too.
Look, it is you, me, and my big sis!
You know, she is... my big sister.
Are you worried I will take her away from you?
She is your big sister, Sota.
I will not take your big sister away, Sota.
Next Time: The Truth Deception Reveals
If you cut it again, everyone'll see that mark.
Looks like a mark of ownership, but maybe I should not tell him that.
